title: Mending America's Political Divide: What Science Tells Us About Solving The Political Hatred Between The Left and The Right
description: If you feel that the current political divisions are harming our country, this book is for you because it provides a science-based, stepwise, approach to build constructive partisanship and re-learn how to engage with and live with political disagreements. Because its approach appeals to our reason as well as our emotions those who reviewed this book found it “transformative.”
author: René H. Levy
